I am confused about two issues. First, Why the angry emails? =C2=A0I don't =
think I have seen this before with this group. Also, I don't get why anyone=
 who is a skeptic would belong to this group.? I mean no disrespect , just =
curious.

--- On Fri, 4/23/10, Lizzie Broden <yahuli69@...> wrote:

F=
rom: Lizzie Broden <yahuli69@...>

o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com

=





 
=C2=A0



  


    
      
      
      
You are ever bit as bad=C2=
=A0as Randi or any of them!=C2=A0 You are just the flip-side of the coin!
=
=C2=A0
Your misuse of the word,=C2=A0"Skeptic" has taken on a totally new m=
eaning.=C2=A0 You see anyone that has a problem with your half baked ideas,=
 and insanity, yeah I said it, as a "Skeptic."
=C2=A0
Maybe it would do you=
 some good to research the word and idea behind it before you go off half c=
ocked as you are.=C2=A0=C2=A0The world is not out to get you or your damned=
 box!=C2=A0 If there is any truth to it, the let's see the evidence of it.=
=C2=A0 Lets look at it for what it is, NOT WHAT YOU OR ANYONE WANTS IT TO B=
E!
=C2=A0
What it is, no more and no less!
=C2=A0
I am a Skeptic, it the tr=
ue sense of the word.=C2=A0 And I have been holding my tongue hoping you wo=
uld pull out of this crap.=C2=A0 Frank, get a grip!
=C2=A0
Not everyone tha=
t disagrees with=C2=A0you is out to get you!=C2=A0 I have real problems wit=
h the whole theory, but I have never questioned your heart or=C2=A0integrit=
y over it.=C2=A0 (Well, other than letting Moon play the dance he is playin=
g with YOUR BOX!)
=C2=A0
But, lets analytically look at this for what it is=
 and find=C2=A0the truth of it?=C2=A0 If you want to turn it into a religio=
n that is on top of some mountain, so be it!=C2=A0 But other people are not=
 going to see the subject in black and white standards.
=C2=A0
Give it a re=
st and thinks about it.=C2=A0 The world is not out to get you Frank!

=C2=
=A0"Nature is showing us only the tail of the lion, but I have no doubt tha=
t the lion belongs to it even though, because of its large size, it cannot =
totally reveal itself all at once." 
-=E2=80=94 Albert Einstein 



"It is =
far better to grasp the universe as it really is than to persist in delusio=
ns, however satisfying and reassuring."
--Carl Sagan


"There is no such th=
ing as an insignificant detail. Don't just look 
for what you want to find.=
"
-- Me LOL 






From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com>
To: EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Fri, April 23, 2010 7:29:14 PM
Subject: Re: [E=
VP-ITC] nuff said?

=C2=A0 


=C2=A0I=C2=A0know what it is, even though I c=
an't even spell it or pronounce it. It's what the skeptics and debunkers to=
ut as the answer to all paranormal experience. I think we ought to pull our=
 claws back in, especially me!
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I have gotten "voices" that I t=
hought were perfectly clear, and no one else could hear it, and some=C2=A0I=
 found=C2=A0was just=C2=A0a snippet of music, so yeah, that happens, but it=
 does not eliminate or explain everything from the boxes, and other EVP met=
hods, you=C2=A0 just have to be aware of the possibility. Anotherr problem =
is broadcast fragments, sometimes they are just what they sound like, an ad=
 for one thing or another, sometimes they can=C2=A0have sychronistic meanin=
g, and sometimes they can be altered in some way to form a messages, such a=
s the recent one I had about learning sex, which was seemingly ignored by a=
ll cuz it has the "s" word--I guess. The fragments can also be distorted as=
 the radio tuning is swept across a station, I don't accept every word and =
syllable as meaning something. You have tio judge mnessage by content and p=
ersonal meaning. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0I have seen faces stand up in a carpet right=
 in front of me, not something I just happened across, something that happe=
ned live as I watched. For someone to suggest that's imagination I find ver=
y offensive.=C2=A0 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0When I first switched to a linear sweep in=
 the boxes, I could hear nothing but gibberish, then suddenly=C2=A0I could =
hear "them"=C2=A0speaking. I doubt that is all imagination either, I think =
the mind(which is not brain) has to reprogram the ears, which are brain, to=
 hear.=C2=A0 I also think the skeptics can not allow this programming to ta=
ke place, hence they can't hear. I would be very surprised if any of the ha=
rd core skeptics even turned on a box for fear that they may hear something=
 that's not there. Rorke(the Phd) implied as much when he wanted a box to t=
est, or more=C2=A0like debunk. That crap is frikkin' pathetic!
=C2=A0
=C2=
=A0
=C2=A0
=C2=A0
F-S
=C2=A0


=C2=A0
On Fri, Apr 23, 2010 at 4:30 PM, Apri=
l Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:


=C2=A0 



Pa=
reidolia is not psuedo science. It is an actual, proven, natural functionin=
g of the brain.

http://en.wikipedia .org/wiki/ Pareidolia

Please read thi=
s article, and more, if you have any questions about it being psuedo scienc=
e. I chose the Wikipedia version because I thought it would be the least of=
fensive to you. Other articles specifically called out EVP and other things=
.

For the record, I don't think all EVP's are due to pareidolia. 




On F=
ri, Apr 23, 2010 at 3:47 PM, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> wr=
ote:


=C2=A0 




=C2=A0It was implied that all this stuff is "Pareidolia"=
 , and because you could put a name on it that somehow meant it was all exp=
lanined. I've been hearing this pseudo scientific BS for 10 years, so I'm a=
 bit touchy. Science explains the paranormal away, and yet people continune=
 to photograph images, and get their names, and the names of deseased loved=
 ones through EVP, as well as questions answered, and science(althogh not a=
ll scientists)=C2=A0just ignores these inconvinient facts and focuses on=C2=
=A0that we=C2=A0might see things that are not there, which I disagree with =
as well. 
=C2=A0
=C2=A0Did you even bother looking at the image on the grou=
p home page. That was from sweeping a TV tuner with a random voltage and vi=
deo recording the monitor screen. So explain away why there is a wolf image=
 embedded in the guy's hat, an image of an alien below his ear, and why in =
God's name does he resembles the classic description=C2=A0of an MIB or=C2=
=A0Shadow Person?=C2=A0 Pareidolia no doubt!
=C2=A0
=C2=A0F-S

r 23, 2010 at 3:19 PM, Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com> wrote:

I agree trying new things is good.=C2=A0 And discussing resul=
ts.=C2=A0 And looking for new directions.=C2=A0=C2=A0 So I'm still not sure=
 who you are upset with.=C2=A0 Perhaps you could be more specific: quote wh=
at you have found objectionable, and let us know why?
